attributes.action: Gyms to remain open in tier 4.
attributes.additional_details: Keep all gym open in tier 4!
attributes.background:
To keep all gyms open during tier 4. 

Statistics prove their has been no sufficient evidence of covid 19 positive cases within gyms. 

Gyms help peoples well being & mental health.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563904
